official_title: To provide that the rate of postage for any first-class mail sent to or from the United States Virgin Islands be 6 percent of the rate which would otherwise apply.

summary.text: Decreases the rate of postage that applies for any first-class mail sent to or from the U.S. Virgin Islands to six percent of such rate.

titles.title: To provide that the rate of postage for any first-class mail sent to or from the United States Virgin Islands be 6 percent of the rate which would otherwise apply.
